messages.content:
U: Give me a comparison grid for two decision frameworks: Track A versus Model B. Goal: spot the risks early.
A: Do you want the table to be narrow or comprehensive?
U: Bias toward control and make tradeoffs explicit.

Here is the comparison in table form:

| Aspect | Track A | Model B | Approach C |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Learning curve | easier to audit | easier to audit | best for large teams |
| Quality control | best for large teams | easier to audit | best for large teams |
| Documentation fit | easier to audit | reversible | best for large teams |
| Long-tail handling | reversible | reversible | reversible |
